Name: baseline_year
Description: Baseline year to be used in the simulations

Name: beta
Description: Surplus housing elasticity in utility function

Name: q0
Description: Basic need in housing (in m²) in utility function

Name: alpha
Description: Composite good elasticity in utility function

Name: coeff_b
Description: Capital elasticity in housing production function

Name: coeff_a
Description: Land elasticity in housing production function

Name: coeff_A
Description: Scale parameter in housing production function

Name: lambda
Description: Gravity parameter in expected income (net of commuting costs) calculation

Name: job_center_threshold
Description: Number of jobs above wich we retain a transport zone (TAZ) as an employment centre

Name: depreciation_rate
Description: Depreciation rate of housing capital

Name: shack_size
Description: Size (in m²) of an informal settlement dwelling unit

Name: RDP_size
Description: Size (in m²) of the dwelling part in a RDP housing unit

Name: backyard_size
Description: Size (in m²) of the backyard part in a RDP housing unit

Name: future_rate_public_housing
Description: Number of formal subsidized housing units built per year in future simulations

Name: informal_structure_value
Description: Cost of inputs (in rands) for building an informal dwelling unit

Name: fraction_z_dwellings
Description: Fraction of the composite good that is kept inside the house and that can possibly be destroyed by floods (food, furniture, etc.)

Name: subsidized_structure_value
Description: Cost of inputs (in rands) for building a formal subsidized dwelling unit

Name: max_land_use
Description: Maximum share of a grid cell land area available for formal private housing that can actually be built

Name: max_land_use_backyard
Description: Maximum share of a grid cell land area available for informal backyard housing that can actually be built

Name: max_land_use_settlement
Description: Maximum share of a grid cell land area available for informal settlement housing that can actually be built

Name: historic_radius
Description: Length (in km) of the radius defining the historic town from the city centre

Name: limit_height_center
Description: Maximum legal height (in m) for buildings in the historic town

Name: limit_height_out
Description: Maximum legal height (in m) for buildings out of the historic town

Name: agricultural_rent_2011
Description: Value (in rands) of the agricultural land price in 2011

Name: agricultural_rent_2001
Description: Value (in rands) of the agricultural land price in 2001

Name: nb_of_income_classes
Description: Number of income groups used in the model

Name: income_distribution
Description: List allocating each income group in the data (12) to one income group in the model (4)

Name: household_size
Description: List associating the average number of workers in a household (comprised of two individuals after taking unemployment into account) to each income group (from poorest to richest)

Name: walking_speed
Description: Speed (in km/h) at which representative households walk to work

Name: time_cost
Description: Multiplier associating the value of time lost in commuting to foregone revenues

Name: time_invest_housing
Description: Lag (in years) for formal private housing building in simulations

Name: time_depreciation_buildings
Description: Time (in years) for the full depreciation of a formal private housing unit

Name: mini_lot_size
Description: Minimum size (in m²) constraint for formal private housing units

Name: precalculated_amenities
Description: Amenity index (real value centered around 1) in each grid cell

Name: income_class_by_housing_type
Description: Multidimensional array of dummies setting income group eligibility to each housing type

Name: income_centers_init
Description: Value (in rands) of annual household income per income group and employment centre

Name: informal_pockets
Description: Disamenity index (real value from 0 to 1) for informal backyards in each grid cell

Name: backyard_pockets
Description: Disamenity index (real value from 0 to 1) for informal settlements in each grid cell

Name: priceTrainPerKM
Description: Variable cost (in rands) for 1km of train commuting

Name: priceTrainFixed
Description: Fixed cost (in rands) for a one-way train trip

Name: priceBusPerKM
Description: Variable cost (in rands) for 1km of bus commuting

Name: priceBusFixed
Description: Fixed cost (in rands) for a one-way bus trip

Name: priceTaxiPerKM
Description: Variable cost (in rands) for 1km of minibus/taxi commuting

Name: priceTaxiFixed
Description: Fixed cost (in rands) for a one-way minibus/taxi trip

Name: priceFixedVehiculeMonth
Description: Fixed cost (in rands) for one month of private car commuting
